name: Cross stitch: Color by Letter
description:
Are you feeling stressed? Don't！

It‘s time to have a fun and relax with a new coloring Art App. Cross stitch – Color by letter is the newest relaxing cross stitch game in 2019 with a thousand beautiful pictures and patterns to work with. You just need to tap on the letter and fill in the correct stitch to find the perfect masterpiece.

# Simplest gameplay: Just select the color thread and click to place stitches

# Unique gameplay: Import and create unique cross stitching photos of your loved ones or patterns you desire

# Endless sewing patterns, lots of pictures: animal, landscape, pets, flowers, celebrations, etc.

# Sew anywhere, no needle, canvas or color thread needed

# No Age Limit : We provide more choice for you and your family! Safe for Kids!

# Share with your friends : let everyone see your beautiful pictures

Find joy and stitch your stress away! Just Cross it!
